mapper.select: SELECT F.COST_NO , F.COST_DATE , D.CODE_DTL_NM "COST_METHOD" , D1.CODE_DTL_NM "COST_CATEGORY" , F.COST_DETAIL , F.COST_BUYER , F.COST_SUM , F.FILE_NAME , F.FILE_RENAME , F.USER_ID FROM FORWIZ_COST_TB F JOIN SYS_CODE_DTL D ON (F.COST_METHOD=D.CODE_DTL) JOIN SYS_CODE_DTL D1 ON (F.COST_CATEGORY = D1.CODE_DTL) WHERE D.CODE_MST = 'COST_METHOD' AND D1.CODE_MST = 'COST_CATEGORY' ORDER BY F.COST_NO DESC

SELECT COST_NO , COST_DATE , COST_METHOD , COST_CATEGORY , COST_DETAIL , COST_BUYER , COST_SUM , FILE_NAME , FILE_RENAME , USER_ID FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN , A.COST_NO , A.COST_DATE , A.COST_METHOD , A.COST_CATEGORY , A.COST_DETAIL , A.COST_BUYER , A.COST_SUM , A.FILE_NAME , A.FILE_RENAME , A.USER_ID FROM ( SELECT F.COST_NO , F.COST_DATE , D.CODE_DTL_NM "COST_METHOD" , D1.CODE_DTL_NM "COST_CATEGORY" , F.COST_DETAIL , F.COST_BUYER , F.COST_SUM , F.FILE_NAME , F.FILE_RENAME , F.USER_ID FROM FORWIZ_COST_TB F JOIN SYS_CODE_DTL D ON (F.COST_METHOD=D.CODE_DTL) JOIN SYS_CODE_DTL D1 ON (F.COST_CATEGORY = D1.CODE_DTL) WHERE D.CODE_MST = 'COST_METHOD' AND D1.CODE_MST = 'COST_CATEGORY' AND
(D1.CODE_DTL_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchName}||'%' OR D.CODE_DTL_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchName}||'%')
D.CODE_DTL_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchName}||'%'
D1.CODE_DTL_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchName}||'%'
1=1
ORDER BY F.COST_NO DESC )A ) WHERE RN > (#{pageNum}-1) * #{amount} AND RN <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}

(D1.CODE_DTL_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchName}||'%' OR D.CODE_DTL_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchName}||'%')
D.CODE_DTL_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchName}||'%'

1=1

SELECT F.COST_NO , F.COST_DATE , D.CODE_DTL_NM "COST_METHOD" , D1.CODE_DTL_NM "COST_CATEGORY" , F.COST_DETAIL , F.COST_BUYER , F.COST_SUM , F.FILE_NAME , F.FILE_RENAME , F.USER_ID FROM FORWIZ_COST_TB F JOIN SYS_CODE_DTL D ON (F.COST_METHOD=D.CODE_DTL) JOIN SYS_CODE_DTL D1 ON (F.COST_CATEGORY = D1.CODE_DTL) WHERE D.CODE_MST = 'COST_METHOD' AND D1.CODE_MST = 'COST_CATEGORY' AND F.COST_NO = #{costNo}
